original_title: Sri Lanka rupee at 320.30/70 against the US dollar, bond yields steady at close
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s bond yields were steady at close on Tuesday, while the rupee closed at 320.30/70 against the US dollar in the spot market, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 27.30/60 percent steady from Friday’s close at 27.30/60 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2027 closed at 27.25/75 percent, up from 27.30 percent on Friday’s close. (Colombo/May02/2023)
